docs.lead_paragraph: A new Missouri law offered a first-of-its-kind solution to the physician shortage plaguing thousands of U.S. communities: Medical school graduates could start treating patients immediately, without wading through years of traditional residency programs.

docs.lead_paragraph: “You are home,” Mr. Trudeau said to 163 refugees after they landed in Toronto, the first of 25,000 the country has promised to take in.

headline.main: Syrian Refugees Greeted by Justin Trudeau in Canada
headline.print_headline: Canada Welcomes New Arrivals From Syria

docs.abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau welcomes group of 163 Syrian refugees; Canada's plan to accept thousands of Syrians offers stark contrast to ongoing debate and controversy in United States over whether to restrict number of refugees or ban influx outright.

docs.lead_paragraph: The slaying of Dr. Teresa Sievers was as mystifying as it was gruesome: After she didn't show up for work one day last June, a worried colleague found the petite redhead's body, bloodied and mutilated, face-down in her kitchen, with 17 crescent-shaped indentations on her head.

docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Missouri System faces significant challenges in the wake of its recent turmoil, but also has an opportunity to become a national leader in addressing racial concerns, the system's interim president said Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The first Canadian government plane carrying Syrian refugees arrived in Toronto late Thursday where they were greeted by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, who is pushing forward with his pledge to resettle 25,000 Syrian refugees by the end of February.

headline.print_headline: First Government Plane Carrying Refugees Arrives in Canada

docs.snippet: The first Canadian government plane carrying Syrian refugees arrived in Toronto late Thursday where they were greeted by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, who is pushing forward with his pledge to resettle 25,000 Syrian refugees by the end of February.

docs.lead_paragraph: Samsung's hopes of ending years of acrimony over whether its computer chip factories caused cancer have hit a hitch: some sickened workers and their families say they'll never accept its highly conditional offer of financial assistance.

headline.main: Samsung Aid for Sick Workers Comes With Conditions, Secrecy
headline.print_headline: Samsung Aid for Sick Workers Comes With Conditions, Secrecy

docs.snippet: Samsung's hopes of ending years of acrimony over whether its computer chip factories caused cancer have hit a hitch: some sickened workers and their families say they'll never accept its highly conditional offer of financial assistance.
